title: Lincoln's WARNING #100066: Crypto Regulation Debate Heats Up
script: Stop scrolling. Crypto Regulation Debate Heats Up? They're selling you fear while pocketing profit. Classic misdirection. Now you know what they didn't want you to see. Support truth. Bitcoin below. Listen up. Crypto Regulation Debate Heats Up... another distraction from the real theft. While you panic, they're laughing to the bank. Wake up. Bitcoin below.
